      • runProcessSilently

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<?> runProcessSilently(PluginProcess process,
                                                         boolean isSequential)
        Description copied from interface: PluginManager
        Runs given process silently (i.e. no task submission notification will be shown). This method is useful to execute tasks directly from within other tasks (i.e. not from FX application thread).
        Specified by:
        runProcessSilently in interface PluginManager
        Parameters:
        process - Process to be executed.
        isSequential - True if task should be executed within the sequential task queue.
        Returns:
        Returns a Future representing that task. The Future's get method will return null upon successful completion.
